members.name: Maya Lin
members.bio: Building democratic digital infrastructure for worker-owned cooperatives. Teaching 'Code purely' workshops.

members.name: Jordan Rivera
members.bio: Helping creative independents 'unf*ck' their contracts. Author of the 'Plain Language Service Agreement'.

members.name: Sarah Kim
members.bio: Crafting visual identities for regenerative agriculture and local food systems.

members.name: Alex Dubois
members.bio: Deploying local LLMs for small businesses to automate admin without giving data to big tech.

members.name: Taylor Washington
members.bio: Designing funding models for community land trusts and neighborhood equity funds.

members.name: Elena Martinez
members.bio: Researching how communities interact with municipal digital services to advocate for better access.

members.name: Nathan Kowalski
members.bio: Running a 'Right to Repair' lab. Designing open-source parts for vintage machinery.

members.name: Olivia Patel
members.bio: Structuring micro-loans and revenue-share agreements for maker-spaces and craft businesses.

members.name: Chris Bennett
members.bio: Teaching 'Personal Knowledge Management' and helping people build their own digital gardens.

members.name: Rosa Alvarado
members.bio: Documenting the rise of the 'Maker Economy' in the American South.

members.name: David Thompson
members.bio: Helping non-profits self-host their email and cloud storage to ensure data sovereignty.

members.name: Lisa Nguyen
members.bio: Strategies for growing businesses through community and content, without paid ads or tracking.

projects.title: Local Food Supply Chain App
projects.description: An open-source logistics tool for connecting urban farmers directly with neighborhood restaurants. removing the middle-man distributor.

projects.title: Artist Collective Legal DAO
projects.description: A lightweight governance structure for a 50-person artist housing co-op. We need to codify our decision-making process into a smart contract (or just a really good regular contract).

projects.title: The 'No-Code' Repair Manual
projects.description: Crowdsourcing repair guides for common household IoT devices that are no longer supported by manufacturers.

events.title: Unf*ck Your Contracts Workshop
events.description: Stop being scared of the legalese. We go line-by-line through a standard MSA and cross out the bullish*t.

events.title: Co-op Tech Office Hours
events.description: Ask questions about setting up digital infrastructure for your collective. Email, chat, cloud - self-hosted.

events.title: Oakland Fabrication Meetup
events.description: tours of local maker spaces and 'show and tell' of current prototypes. Pizza provided by local sourdough bakery.

sparkFeed.author: Maya Lin
sparkFeed.content: Just discovered that you can host a static site on a Raspberry Pi 5 with Cloudflare Tunnel for free. Game changer for local businesses.

sparkFeed.author: Chris Bennett
sparkFeed.content: The best documentation is the one you actually write. Stop looking for the perfect tool and just use Markdown files.

sparkFeed.author: Elena Martinez
sparkFeed.content: Is anyone else seeing a shift away from 'User Experience' towards 'User Agency'? I want to build tools that give people power, not just 'delight'.

sparkFeed.author: Nathan Kowalski
sparkFeed.content: 3D printed a replacement gear for a 1950s stand mixer today. Total cost: $0.12. Value of kept appliance: $300. Value of keeping it out of landfill: Priceless.
